law.catch_line: A member of the Authority, a person executing a bond or agreement of the Authority under this subtit...
law.text:
A member of the Authority, a person executing a bond or agreement of the Authority under this subtitle, or an employee of the Authority, the Department, or the State is not:
personally liable on a bond or agreement of the Authority; or
subject to personal liability or accountability arising from the issuance, execution, or delivery of a bond or agreement of the Authority.
